mapper.select: SELECT p.penalty_id, p.member_id, u.user_name AS member_name, p.penalty_type, p.reason, p.post_id, p.comment_id, p.review_id, p.created_at, p.is_active FROM user_penalty_history p JOIN user u ON p.member_id = u.user_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} AND p.penalty_type = #{penaltyType} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
